name: IP Board minimal style (AutoHotkey forum)
description: Style for the AutoHotkey Community forum! Once again, getting rid of huge irritating margins and line heights, enlarging some mini-font-sizes and aligning unnessecary block-stacked elements. I reduced the content wrapper width for more density on topic pages, as opposed to the table of forum topics and search results, which are wider.

user.name: sharethewisdom
user.about:
I like keyboard navigation, which also makes browsing more pleasant. I find it strange that web developers use so many unnecessary margins and sub menu's. 
That's why I currently (October 2013) use Firefox 23.0.1 with vimperator 3.7.1 and some interesting plugins from here https://github.com/vimpr/vimperator-plugins.

additional_info:
please leave a comment for suggestions
19/1/2014 changes for the search index page and other stuff.
22/1/2014 both forum and search table are now more consistently styled: more dense yet still comfortable to use. (if you disagree, leave a comment)
23/1/2014 added screenshots and distinguished search table (topics) from search box (posts and help)
